com.googlecode.flaxcrawler
Class DefaultCrawler

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.flaxcrawler.DefaultCrawler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Crawler
public class DefaultCrawler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Crawler

Default crawler implementation. It is highly recommended to inherit your own crawlers from the DefaultCrawler.

Author:
ameshkov
